summary: In 1969 PRChina, two men survive a supernatural tomb. They later become tomb raiders with Shirley/Qi Shu. 20 years later in NYC, one is hired to find that tomb again and the 2 friends follow later.
cast: Kun Chen|Angelababy|Qi Shu|Keith Collea|Alex Eckstorm|Marianna German|Sandra Gumuzzio|Bo Huang|Xi Huang|Lorie Kellogg|Jonathan Kos-Read|Omar Krystion|Kevin Lee|Ivan Leon|Xiaoqing Liu|Yi Liu|Sean Mejia|Taso Mikroulis|Cherry Ngan|Lawrence Novak|Jay Parel|Bryan Sanchez|Yoni Schanzer|D.J. Sisco|Athony Solano|Ivan Vila|Nesha Ward|Jeffrey Weiner|Darnell White Jr.|Yu Xia
title: Xun long jue
